---========= transaction format =========---

02000000 // version // 4 bytes
00 01 // optional segregated witness marker + flag // 2 bytes 
03 // inputs

ed204affc7519dfce341db0569687569d12b1520a91a9824531c038ad62aa9d1010000006a47304402200da2c4d8f2f44a8154fe127fe5bbe93be492aa589870fe77eb537681bc29c8ec02201eee7504e37db2ef27fa29afda46b6c331cd1a651bb6fa5fd85dcf51ac01567a01210242BF11B788DDFF450C791F16E83465CC67328CA945C703469A08E37EF0D0E061ffffffff
9cb872539fbe1bc0b9c5562195095f3f35e6e13919259956c6263c9bd53b20b70100000000ffffffff
8012f1ec8aa9a63cf8b200c25ddae2dece42a2495cc473c1758972cfcd84d90401000000171600146a721dcca372f3c17b2c649b2ba61aa0fda98a91ffffffff

01 // outputs

b580f50000000000160014cb61ee4568082cb59ac26bb96ec8fbe0109a4c00

// witness 
00 // witness items first input
02 // witness items second input
48 // item len
3045022100f8dac321b0429798df2952d086e763dd5b374d031c7f400d92370ae3c5f57afd0220531207b28b1b137573941c7b3cf5384a3658ef5fc238d26150d8f75b2bcc61e701 // sig item
21 // item len
025972A1F2532B44348501075075B31EB21C02EEF276B91DB99D30703F2081B773 // pubkey item
02 // witness items third input
47 // item len
304402204ebf033caf3a1a210623e98b49acb41db2220c531843106d5c50736b144b15aa02201a006be1ebc2ffef0927d4458e3bb5e41e5abc7e44fc5ceb920049b46f87971101 // sig item
21 // item len
02AE68D299CBB8AB99BF24C9AF79A7B13D28AC8CD21F6F7F750300EDA41A589A5D // pubkey item

00000000 // locktime

---========= ++++++++++++++++++ =========---
